sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-carousel', templateUrl: './carousel.component.html', styleUrls: ['./carousel.component.css'], }) export class CarouselComponent implements OnInit { slides: any[] = new Array(3).fill({ id: -1, src: '', title: '', subtitle: '', }); constructor() {} ngOnInit(): void { this.slides[0] = { src: 'https://picsum.photos/200/300', }; this.slides[1] = { src: './assets/img/react.jpg', }; this.slides[2] = { src: './assets/img/vue.jpg', }; } }
First Slide
